explains: n. 全音阶；全音域；整个范围
wordGroup: color gamut 色饱和度；颜色范围

sentences.en: The show runs the gamut of 20th century design.
sentences.cn: 此次展览囊括了20世纪的全部设计。

sentences.en: The network will provide the gamut of computer services to your home.
sentences.cn: 这个网络将为家庭提供全方位的计算机服务。

sentences.en: She felt she had run the (whole) gamut of human emotions from joy to despair.
sentences.cn: 她感到自己尝遍了从喜到悲的人类的一切情感。
